00023 // Cr√©ation d'un corps pour Ogre
00024 btRigidBody* PhysicComponent::localCreateRigidBody (btScalar mass, const btTransform& startTransform, btCollisionShape* shape,Ogre::SceneNode* nodeOgre) {
00025 
00026         bool isDynamic = (mass != 0.f);
00027 
00028         btVector3 localInertia(0,0,0);
00029 
00030         if (isDynamic) {
00031                 shape->calculateLocalInertia(mass,localInertia);
00032         }
00033         btMotionState* myMotionState = new TetraMotionState(startTransform, nodeOgre);
00034 
00035         btRigidBody::btRigidBodyConstructionInfo rbInfo(mass,myMotionState,shape,localInertia);
00036         btRigidBody* body = new btRigidBody(rbInfo);
00037 
00038         World->addRigidBody(body);
00039         return body;
00040 }
00041 
00042 // Cr√©ation d'un corps pour GL
00043 btRigidBody* PhysicComponent::localCreateRigidBody (btScalar mass, const btTransform& startTransform, btCollisionShape* shape) {
00044 
00045         bool isDynamic = (mass != 0.f);
00046         btVector3 localInertia(0,0,0);
00047 
00048         if (isDynamic) {
00049                 shape->calculateLocalInertia(mass,localInertia);
00050         }
00051 
00052         btDefaultMotionState* myMotionState = new btDefaultMotionState(startTransform);
00053 
00054         btRigidBody::btRigidBodyConstructionInfo rbInfo(mass,myMotionState,shape,localInertia);
00055 
00056         btRigidBody* body = new btRigidBody(rbInfo);
00057 
00058         World->addRigidBody(body);
00059 
00060         return body;
00061 }
